Hayden Johnston

hjohnston.g@gmail.com

I am an aspiring software engineer currently enrolled in the Computer Science Post-Bacc program at Oregon State University. I am interested in full-stack development with a focus on reactive UI design.

Projects

ISS Tracking App

Personal Project

Sends a Twitter update when the ISS will be visible tomorrow, in a selection of cities in Oregon if the sky will be clear there. Created using Python and NASA's spot the station API with Open Weather API; works for most cities and states.

Interests

When I'm not studying or working on personal coding projects, I spend time growing edible mushrooms and performing mycological labwork. I am particularly interested in fungi with medicinal properties and isolating monokaryons for hybridization to produce higher alkaloid contents. I aspire to perform meaningful analysis of genetic content in such fungi.

I also enjoy activities outside, especially if I'm on a snowboard. I have been involved with martial arts since I was young and hold a black belt in Chun Kuk Do. Cooking is a hobby of mine as well as music production. Otherwise I spend my time with family, friends and my two cats.
